#summary it organize the data tree that the application will use.

= Introduction =

Add your content here.


= Details =

Below an example of the view file:
{{{
<data-def name="DATA_REDUCTION"> 
    <group key="detectors"> 
        <group key="detector"> 
            <item key="camera"/> 
            <item key="dark"/> 
            <item key="distance"/> 
            <item key="exposureTime"/> 
            <item key="shutterCloseDelay"/> 
            <item key="xBin"/> 
            <item key="yBin"/> 
        </group> 
        <group key="monitor"> 
            <item key="mi"/> 
            <item key="gain"/> 
            <item key="intensity_monitor"/>
        </group> 
        <group key="monochromator"> 
            <item key="lambda"/> 
            <item key="energy_mono"/> 
        </group> 
    </group> 
    <group key="data"> 
        <item key="images"/> 
        <item key="spectrums"/> 
        <item key="x_position"/> 
        <item key="y_position"/> 
    </group> 
    <group key="info"> 
        <item key="comments"/> 
    </group> 
</data-def>
}}}
